title:
Minimal Free Resolutions of Edge Ideals of Edge-Weighted Complete
  Bipartite Graphs
authors: Bethany Kubik and Denise Rangel Tracy and Keri Ann Sather-Wagstaff
abstract:
We explicitly describe cellular minimal free resolutions of certain classes
of edge ideals of weighted complete bipartite graphs based on a construction of
Visscher. Specifically, we show that Visscher's construction minimally resolves
all edge ideals of undirected vertex-weighted complete bipartite graphs, and we
characterize the edge-weighted complete bipartite graphs whose edge ideals are
minimally resolved by Visscher's construction.
